South Park
  • Places
  • Residents
  • History

Places

South Park is a home for many small cozy coffee shops, restaurants, shops and even a brewery! Explore all that this little park has to offer.

  • Caffe Centro

    caffecentro.com

    Caffe Centro has been at the heart of the South Park Community for over 20 years; providing local residents and the business community with quick, simple, and delicious food & drink.

  • South Park Cafe

    southparkcafe.com

    It seems like a slice of small-town France, set the Gallic flavor. In the last 20 years this unpretentious cafe with a serious kitchen has matured into one of the best little French restaurants in San Francisco.

  • Butler & The Chef

    butlerandthechef.com

    Tiny French bistro offering classic breakfasts & lunches, including a notable croque monsieur. Amazing for brunches!

  • The American Grilled Cheese Kitchen

    theamericansf.com

    Breakfast & lunch eatery specializing in upgraded takes on grilled-cheese sandwiches. Has outdoors seating!

  • Ozone Thai

    ozonethai.org

    A balance of sweet and spicy flavors characterizes the enticing food selections found at Ozone Thai. Fresh fruit such as mango, pineapple and tangerine provide natural enhancement to many of the entrees, and are balanced with citrus, lemongrass, cilantro, mint and herbs.

  • 21st Amendment Brewery

    21st-amendment.com

    The popular brewpub is now at the heart of the new city center. In addition to eight rotating taps of multiple award-winning hand-crafted house beers, the pub has been voted “Best Brewpub”, “Best Burger” and “Best Happy Hour” by the San Francisco press

  • Small Foods Market

    smallfoodssf.com

    Modern convenient store offers a small selection of locally sourced groceries & a full-service cafe. Great for morning coffee and muffins.

  • Jeremys Department Store

    jeremys.com

    Features discounted high-fashion apparel and shoes from designers and other major department stores

  • Gallery 16

    gallery16.com

    This art gallery showcases a rotating collection of modern paintings, photos and unique installations.

South Park
